ocean.question: I have many arms but cannot hug. I live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I am an invertebrate.
💦 You might find me in a tide pool.
🖤 I can release ink to escape danger.

ocean.question: I am a very big fish with a toothy grin. People are sometimes scared of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I am a predator.
🌊 I live in salt water.
🦷 I have many rows of sharp teeth.

ocean.question: I am a home to many fish and plants. I am made of tiny creatures. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I am built over many years.
🐠 Many colorful fish live near me.
🌞 I need sunlight to survive.

ocean.question: I am a mammal that lives in the ocean and sings beautiful songs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am very large.
💨 I breathe air through a blowhole.
🎶 I communicate with clicks and songs.

ocean.question: I am a colorful fish that can change my gender. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I live in coral reefs.
🐠 I am small and brightly colored.
👧 I can start as a female and turn into a male.

ocean.question: I am a slow-moving sea creature with a hard shell on my back. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I lay my eggs on the beach.
🌿 I eat seagrass and jellyfish.
👵 I can live for a very long time.

ocean.question: I am a type of ocean current driven by differences in water density. What am I?

hints.text: 🌡️ Density is affected by temperature and salinity.
🔄 I help regulate global climate.
🌊 I am a slow-moving current.

ocean.question: I am a place in the ocean where it is completely dark and the pressure is very high. What am I?

hints.text: 🔦 Sunlight cannot reach me.
👾 Strange creatures live there.
🌎 I am the deepest part of the ocean.

ocean.question: I am a type of plankton that can perform photosynthesis. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am a producer in the marine food web.
🔬 I am a microscopic organism.
🌞 I use sunlight to create energy.

ocean.question: I am the movement of water caused by the gravitational pull of the moon and sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 The moon has the biggest influence on me.
🌊 I cause high and low tides.
🎣 Fishermen need to know about me.

food.question: I am yellow, long, and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys love me! What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Think of a fruit a monkey might eat.
💛 I grow in bunches.
💪 You can peel me easily.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me with cookies. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I come from an animal.
🥛 I'm a liquid.
🍪 I taste great with sweets.

food.question: I am round and red, and grow on trees. An apple a day keeps the doctor away. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I grow on a tree.
🍎 I am a fruit.
🔴 I am often red, but can be green or yellow too!

food.question: I am long and orange, and bunnies love to eat me. I'm good for your eyes! What am I?

hints.text: 🐰 A furry animal likes to eat me.
🥕 I am a vegetable.
🧡 I am the color of a pumpkin.

food.question: I am a popular party snack that can be cooked in a microwave. I come in many flavors, but start as a kernel. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 Movies are better with me.
🌽 I am made from a grain.
🎬 You often eat me at the cinema.

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy brown skin and green inside. I am a good source of Vitamin C. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 I have small black seeds inside.
🐻 I'm named after a flightless bird.
🟤 I am brown and fuzzy on the outside.

food.question: I am a vegetable that makes people cry when they chop me. I have layers. What am I?

hints.text: 😭 I can make you sad while you cook me
🧅 I grow underground.
🔪 You peel me, layer by layer.

food.question: I am a food that is made from flour, water, and yeast. You bake me in an oven and you can make sandwiches with me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 Many kinds exist like sourdough or rye
🌾 I come from a grain.
🥪 I am often eaten with fillings.

food.question: I am a sweet treat made from sugar, eggs, and butter. I am often decorated with frosting and candles. What am I?

hints.text: 🎂 People celebrate with me.
🕯️ I'm often eaten on birthdays.
🍬 I am very sweet and sugary.

food.question: I am a food made from fermented milk. I can be hard or soft, and come in many flavors. Mice are said to love me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧀 Different countries make me in different ways
🐭 Cartoons often show rodents enjoying me.
🐄 I am made from milk.
